nav.div: South Park School District » News » Coronavirus Information & Resources

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Coronavirus Information & Resources

div.img:
The South Park School District is closely monitoring the developments about the Coronavirus (COVID-19). To equip families with information and resources, the South Park School District has prepared a new website with details about the district's precautions and important preventative measures suggested by public health agencies including the Allegheny County Health Department, the Pennsylvania Department of Health, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and the World Health Organization.
To visit the COVID-19 website, click here.

div.div: 2005 Eagle Ridge Drive, South Park, PA 15129 | Phone 412-655-3111 | Fax 412-655-2952

div.span: Website by SchoolMessenger Presence. © 2020 Intrado Corporation. All rights reserved.
